vclaim:
No, this is not a real photo of former US president Barack Obama watching Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s inauguration

A photo has been shared hundreds of times in multiple Facebook posts which claim it shows former US president Barack Obama watching Narendra Modi on TV being sworn in as India’s prime minister following his landslide victory in 2019 elections. The claim is false; the image has been doctored from a 2014 picture taken by a New York Times photographer which shows Obama watching a FIFA World Cup match aboard Air Force One.

The photo has been posted widely on Facebook, for example here on May 30, 2019. It has been shared more than 270 times.

The misleading post’s caption says: “This is the power of Modi, even Obama in America is watching and listening to Modi's swearing in ceremony.”

Below is a screenshot of the misleading post:

The same photo and claim have been shared repeatedly on Facebook, for example here and here.

Modi was sworn in for a second term on May 30, 2019. Here is an AFP report on the ceremony.

Barack Obama is former president of the United States of America.

A reverse image search on Google found the original image was posted here on June 26, 2014, by a New York Times photographer Doug Mills on his verified Twitter account.

The tweet says: “President Obama watches the USA vs Germany World Cup game aboard Air Force One enroute to Minneapolis. #worldcup”.

The US played Germany on June 26 in the 2014 FIFA World Cup. Here is the match report on FIFA’s official website.

Here is an AFP story on Obama watching the World Cup which includes a similar photo taken from a slightly different angle.

The photo caption states: "US President Barack Obama and Senior Advisor Valerie Jarrett (L) watch the 2014 World Cup match between the US and Germany while en route to Minnepolis, Minnesota on June 26, 2014 (AFP Photo/Mandel Ngan)".

AFP photos of Obama watching the Germany-USA match can be seen here on AFP Image Forum.

The image of Modi which has been superimposed over the football match on the television screen in the original image was posted here on India’s ruling Bharatiya Janata Party Harayana verified Twitter handle and shows Modi at his swearing in ceremony May 30, 2019.

The caption in Hindi translates to English as: “History is in making, this oath ceremony is the support of the people, development and faith.”
